seo.title: Vernazza Agriturismi 2025 | Farm Stays in Cinque Terre Hills
seo.description: Discover authentic agriturismi near Vernazza. Vineyard stays, wine tasting, and peaceful farm accommodation in the Cinque Terre countryside.

body.title: Agriturismi near Vernazza
body.subtitle: Stay in the vineyards above Vernazza. Working farms producing Cinque Terre wine with stunning views and authentic Ligurian hospitality.

features.title: Vineyard Settings
features.description: Stay among terraced vines with sea views.

features.title: Wine Tastings
features.description: Sample Vernaccia and Sciacchetr√† wines on-site.

features.title: Panoramic Views
features.description: Overlook Vernazza and the coast from hilltop locations.

features.title: Trail Access
features.description: Walk down to Vernazza or hike to other villages.

features.title: Peaceful Retreat
features.description: Escape the crowds while staying close to the action.
